products.title: Nitecore MT06MD Torch
products.subtitle: A tool to check your dazzle and PLR reflexes. More potent and compact than your ophthalmoscope
products.description:
I often find that vets struggle to judge Dazzle and PLRs. These are cornerstones of your neuro-ophthalmology exam, which frequently cannot be determined with most ophthalmoscopes. Why? They are not potent enough.

A pen torch like this can solve that problem for very little money.

At its lowest setting, it potentially can allow you retinal examination with condensing lens without causing undue discomfort.

products.title: Blukar Head Torch Rechargeable
products.subtitle: Essential for vein finding and intubation in low-light conditions
products.description:
Not an ophthalmology tool per se, but incredibly useful to find veins or trying to insert an ET tube during induction with low light or whenever a laryngoscope is not at hand.

A hands-free lighting solution that makes procedures easier in dark or confined spaces.

products.title: BEXCO 20D Double Aspheric Ophthalmic Magnifier Lens
products.subtitle: An affordable alternative for indirect retinal examination
products.description:
A very economic alternative for indirect retinal examination (in combination with pen torch) for those that can't afford an expensive condensing lens.

This double aspheric design provides clear, distortion-free viewing for effective fundus examination.
